<div type="collation" xml:id="C26"> <anchor type="collate" xml:id="C26"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <seg sID="C26_app5-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0102__main__24"/> One evening I sat <seg eID="C26_app5-fMS"/> in my <seg sID="C26_app7-fMS"/> <del instant="true" rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0102__main__d4e18796">chemic</del> <lb n="c57-0102__main__25"/>workshop, <seg eID="C26_app7-fMS"/> the sun had <seg sID="C26_app9-fMS"/> set <seg eID="C26_app9-fMS"/> & the moon <lb n="c57-0102__main__26"/>was just rising from the <seg sID="C26_app11-fMS"/> sea — <seg eID="C26_app11-fMS"/> I had not <seg sID="C26_app13-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0102__main__27"/>light sufficient <seg eID="C26_app13-fMS"/> for my <seg sID="C26_app15-fMS"/> <mod sID="c57-0102__main__d4e18806"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0102__main__d4e18808">work</del> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0102__main__d4e18811"/>employment <sga-add eID="c57-0102__main__d4e18811"/><mod eID="c57-0102__main__d4e18806"/> <seg eID="C26_app15-fMS"/> and I <seg sID="C26_app17-fMS"/> sat <lb n="c57-0102__main__28"/>idle <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0102__main__d4e18817">mus</del> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0102__main__d4e18820">untill</del> <seg eID="C26_app17-fMS"/> in <seg sID="C26_app19-fMS"/> <mod sID="c57-0102__main__d4e18823"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0102__main__d4e18825">the</del> <sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0102__main__d4e18828"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0102__main__d4e18828"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0102__main__d4e18834"/>a <seg eID="C26_app19-fMS"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0102__main__d4e18834"/><mod eID="c57-0102__main__d4e18823"/>pause of consideration <lb n="c57-0102__main__29"/>of whether I should leave my labour for <lb n="c57-0102__main__30"/>the <seg sID="C26_app21-fMS"/> night <seg eID="C26_app21-fMS"/> or hasten its conclusion by an <lb n="c57-0102__main__31"/>unremitting attention to it. As I <seg sID="C26_app23-fMS"/> sat <seg eID="C26_app23-fMS"/> a train <lb n="c57-0102__main__32"/>of reflection <seg sID="C26_app25-fMS"/> occur <mod sID="c57-0102__main__d4e18847"/> <mdel>e</mdel> <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c57-0102__main__d4e18851"/>r <sga-add eID="c57-0102__main__d4e18851"/><mod eID="c57-0102__main__d4e18847"/> ed <seg eID="C26_app25-fMS"/> to <seg sID="C26_app27-fMS"/> me <seg eID="C26_app27-fMS"/> which led <seg sID="C26_app29-fMS"/> to me <seg eID="C26_app29-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0102__main__33"/>consider the effects of what I was now <lb n="c57-0102__main__34"/>doing. <seg sID="C26_app31-fMS"/> <mod sID="c57-0102__main__d4e18860"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0102__main__d4e18862">Two</del> <sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0102__main__d4e18865"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0102__main__d4e18865"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0102__main__d4e18871"/>three <seg eID="C26_app31-fMS"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0102__main__d4e18871"/><mod eID="c57-0102__main__d4e18860"/>years before I <seg sID="C26_app33-fMS"/> had been <seg eID="C26_app33-fMS"/> engaged <lb n="c57-0102__main__35"/>in the same <seg sID="C26_app35-fMS"/> manner <seg eID="C26_app35-fMS"/> & had created a <lb n="c57-0102__main__36"/>fiend whose <seg sID="C26_app37-fMS"/> unparralelled <seg eID="C26_app37-fMS"/> barbarity had <lb n="c57-0103__main__1"/>desolated my <seg sID="C26_app39-fMS"/> heart <seg eID="C26_app39-fMS"/> and filled it <seg sID="C26_app41-fMS"/> <w ana="start"/>for<lb n="c57-0103__main__2"/>ever<w ana="end"/> <seg eID="C26_app41-fMS"/> with the bitterest remorse. I was <lb n="c57-0103__main__3"/>now about to form another <seg sID="C26_app43-fMS"/> being <seg eID="C26_app43-fMS"/> of whose <lb n="c57-0103__main__4"/>dispositions I was alike <seg sID="C26_app45-fMS"/> ignorant. <seg eID="C26_app45-fMS"/> She <lb n="c57-0103__main__5"/>might <seg sID="C26_app47-fMS"/> be <seg eID="C26_app47-fMS"/> ten thousand times more <w ana="start"/>ma<lb n="c57-0103__main__6"/>lignant<w ana="end"/> than her <seg sID="C26_app49-fMS"/> mate <seg eID="C26_app49-fMS"/> and <seg sID="C26_app51-fMS"/> delight <seg eID="C26_app51-fMS"/> in <lb n="c57-0103__main__7"/>murder & wretchedness. He had sworn <lb n="c57-0103__main__8"/>to quit the neighbourhood of <seg sID="C26_app53-fMS"/> man <seg eID="C26_app53-fMS"/> & hide <lb n="c57-0103__main__9"/>himself in <seg sID="C26_app55-fMS"/> desarts <seg eID="C26_app55-fMS"/> but she had <seg sID="C26_app57-fMS"/> not &<lb n="c57-0103__main__10"/>she <seg eID="C26_app57-fMS"/> who <seg sID="C26_app59-fMS"/> was in all probability <seg eID="C26_app59-fMS"/> to become <lb n="c57-0103__main__11"/>a thinking & reasoning <seg sID="C26_app61-fMS"/> animal <seg eID="C26_app61-fMS"/> might <lb n="c57-0103__main__12"/>refuse to <seg sID="C26_app63-fMS"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0103__main__d4e18925">to</del> comply with a compact made <lb n="c57-0103__main__13"/>before her creation. They might even <lb n="c57-0103__main__14"/>hate <seg eID="C26_app63-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C26_app64-fMS"/> one another. <seg eID="C26_app64-fMS"/> The creature who <w ana="start"/>al<lb n="c57-0103__main__15"/>ready<w ana="end"/> lived loathed his own <seg sID="C26_app66-fMS"/> deformity <seg eID="C26_app66-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0103__main__16"/>& might he not conceive a greater <w ana="start"/>ab<lb n="c57-0103__main__17"/>horrence<w ana="end"/> for it when it came before <lb n="c57-0103__main__18"/>his eyes in the female <seg sID="C26_app68-fMS"/> form. <seg eID="C26_app68-fMS"/> She also <lb n="c57-0103__main__19"/>might turn with disgust from him <lb n="c57-0103__main__20"/>to the superior beauty of <seg sID="C26_app70-fMS"/> man <delSpan rend="strikethrough" spanTo="#c57-0103.01"/>& who <lb n="c57-0103__main__21"/>confine her eyes or wishes <delSpan anchor="c57-0103.01"/>. <seg eID="C26_app70-fMS"/> She might <lb n="c57-0103__main__22"/>quit <seg sID="C26_app72-fMS"/> him <seg eID="C26_app72-fMS"/> and he be again <seg <seg sID="C26_app110-fMS"/> me, when <seg eID="C26_app110-fMS"/> on looking <seg sID="C26_app112-fMS"/> up <seg eID="C26_app112-fMS"/> I <seg sID="C26_app114-fMS"/> saw <seg eID="C26_app114-fMS"/> <lb n="c57-0104__main__8"/>by the light of the moon, the dæmon <seg sID="C26_app116-fMS"/> <mod sID="c57-0104__main__d4e19122"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0104__main__d4e19124">with</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0104__main__d4e19127"/>at the <seg eID="C26_app116-fMS"/>
